name: World of Wardrake
description:
Prototype of ideas. No real gameplay, more a showcasing of different things.

WASD = Movement

Rightclick + drag = Camera Rotation

Scrollwheel = Zoom in/out

Leftclick = Select/Target

1, 2, 3 = Ability Bar spells(must select wolf target)

b, shift + b = open/close bag, open/close all bags

i = inventory open/close

Space = if staff is equipped, shapechange

Rightclick + dead wolf, Shift + Rightclick + dead wolf = lootbox, lootall

c = spawn container into inventory

p = spawn items into inventory

Click on items to equip/use. Drag and droppable.
